ClassTrait2: While Bloodied, gain Aura 5. Downgrade resistances and immunities to Lightning of enemies in aura. Enemies ending their turn in aura take E Lightning damage.
ClassTrait3:
On an initiative of 10+(initiative check), choose one:
- End a status effect affecting you.
- Shift 2 and use Chain Lightning.
